page.title: 09HOUSING-LOCAL SURVEY.
page.content: On Thursday 23rd May 1985, we went out to survey the houses in our 1km square.This was six streets. On our survey sheet we recorded,type of house and what they had e,g. detached and semi - detached, and bungalows and flats; garages chimneys,gardens, numbers and names. The most popular dwellings were the detached houses. I surveyed 20 houses in the Harrowby Drive and Winchester Drive area. 17 of them were detached,and 2 were semi-detached and one was a bungalow.There was a fire hydrant outside number 24. Number 36 had a pond and a drive in and drive out drive.Number 2 had window shutters, a greek like doorway and a burglar alarm. Outside the houses were grass verges planted with blossom trees.All the houses had a garage.None were identical..
